duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with Engineering and Operations team on process efficiency improvements, cost savings and/or technology advancement.
Attending meetings with leadership team, reporting out and assigned tasks from meeting.
Work with engineers and identify paper defects.
Work with leadership to modify or create standard operating procedures.
Project work as assigned by mill management.

education_certification.credential: Mechanical Engineering degree with a concentration in Mechanical Engineering discipline. Must have completed a minimum of 1-full year of course work, with a preference for those who have completed 2-full years. A minimum 3.0 GPA is preferred. Solid Microsoft Office skills, particularly in Excel.
